The movie explores themes of identity, relationship, and the future of technology. The cast includes Jennifer Lawrence as Amy, John Krasinski as Theodore, Mindy Kaling as Elizabeth, and Tom Hanks as Steve.
Based on your preferences, I would also recommend the movie "Zero Effect". It is a story about two detectives named Daryl Zero and Steve Arlo who investigate a complex and mysterious case of blackmail and missing keys for shady tycoon Gregory Stark who is less than forthcoming about what is really happening!  The movie explores themes of crime, investigation, detective work, and the dangers and complexities of modern-day criminal investigations. The cast includes Angela Featherstone as Daryl Zero, Jim Broadbent as Steve Arlo, Vanessa Redgrave as Elizabeth, and Bob Peck as Gregory Stark.
I hope these recommendations are helpful to you!
